scripts.postpull: git checkout development &>/dev/null || git checkout -b development &> /dev/null
scripts.commit: sh -c 'if [[ -n $(git status --porcelain) ]]; then git add . &> /dev/null && echo ${0} ${*} | git commit -aF - &> /dev/null && git push &> /dev/null; fi'
scripts.precommit: bun run --silent repo && bun run --silent postpull
scripts.deploy: sh -c 'git merge development -m "v$(node -p process.env.npm_package_version)" &> /dev/null; git push &> /dev/null'
scripts.postdeploy: git stash clear &> /dev/null ; bun run --silent postpull
